Description: Shoulder sherd of Attic, probably black-figured pottery closed vase, perhaps a large lekythos; exterior: black band at slight offset at top of shoulder; below, lotus flower and bud frieze on shoulder with added red on calyxes; dilute line on carination at top of body.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. VII no.13)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2070)
